name: barry the clumsy elephant
description:
How many times can you make him jump ?  (he's very clumsy so it's kinda hard) My best score is 10. CONTROLS : Spacebar (hold down / release)(note that you may have to click once inside the game window to be able to control) 

Playing in the browser is totally ok but you should know that the ~downloadable version~ has NEXT-GEN GRAPHICS and more scientifically accurate elephant physics, as shown in the gif and video below :
